3FBA96C2.Line5.101BAB: Yep, things might be changing around here soon... wait and see.

6736ED00.Line3.101BAB: Between you and me, everyone knows he's going soft.

8EB34783.Line1.101CAF: Say, what's this town like? And the guy in charge? Every crew needs a good captain.

8FF0C28F.VoiceDir5.101BAB: Smug and somewhat cryptic. He's hoping the guy in charge will be overthrown soon, and he's implying that here.
